long_description: The Seattle Sports ATC boat cart transports your canoe or kayak to the water via large, 16 in. bike tires and a solid steel frame. Ideally suited for heavy canoe portages and other large watercraft, the Seattle Sports ATC boat cart offers a natural height for pulling or pushing. The spacing of the supports can adjusted to accommodate varying hull sizes: configure to a 13 in., 16 in. or 18.5 in. setting to best fit your watercraft. Cart collapses to facilitate low-profile storage. Powder-coated steel frame provides durable use. Includes a spring-loaded kickstand, adjustable padded bars and cinch strap. Cart can support up to 300 lbs.
short_description: The Seattle Sports ATC boat cart transports your canoe or kayak to the water via large, 16 in. bike tires and a solid steel frame.
